version_description:
myCARFAX makes taking care of your car easier than ever! 
New in this release:
- Now you can track up to 8 cars in myCARFAX! 

View your service history, get alerts for upcoming service and registration, track your CARFAX History-Based Value and be the first to know about open recalls!

myCARFAX makes taking care of your car easier than ever! 
New in this release:
- myCARFAX is now available for Apple Watch!
- Bug fixes and UI improvements to make your experience better

myCARFAX makes taking care of your car easier than ever!
New in this release:
-Gas mileage tracker
By popular demand, you can now track your gas mileage, fuel efficiency and gas costs! Know your car’s fuel efficiency, track how much you are spending on gas, and monitor the health of your car.
• Track your average mpg, last fill-up, mileage, date, odometer and costs
• View charts and logs from your most recent fill-ups
• Access your gas efficiency by MPG or L/100 KM

Gas mileage tracker is now available within the Glovebox section of the app. Check it out today!

myCARFAX makes taking care of your car easier than ever!
New in this release:
By popular demand you can now choose from more than 1,700 types of service when adding a record – everything from changing brake pads to xyz!

Also you can now set the order of your cars in your garage.

You can add service records by selecting the Service History tab and clicking the “Add Record” button.
You can also click “Add Record” for any items on the dashboard.

The real magic of myCARFAX is that your service records are automatically included when you visit a myCARFAX participating shop!

myCARFAX makes taking care of your car easier than ever!
New in this release:
-Bug fixes and UI improvements to make your experience better

Our new release is all about helping simplify your experience!
- We’re automatically bringing the most important updates to the top of your dashboard.
- There is a simple way for you to add your last oil change, even if you don’t remember the exact date.
- Store your license plate in the glovebox so it’s always at your fingertips.

We have much more to come in our future releases!
Your feedback is very important to us, please keep the awesome suggestions coming and continue to let us know when you experience any problems.

myCARFAX makes taking care of your car easier than ever!
New in this release:
- Bug fixes and UI improvements to make your experience better.
- Bug fixes and UI improvements to make your experience better.

Tires just got better...again! Track the status of your tires with custom tread life reminders. Not sure if you need new tires? Our new "Check Tires" screen provides you with tips and pictures to help guide you through your tire inspection.

Get ready for one of our most anticipated features! You can now upload receipts & documents for any of your services!
Simply add your last tire rotation, even if you don’t remember the exact date.
Newer cars now have the option in the glovebox to display your CARFAX History-Based Value.

We're giving you more flexibility on when you can receive service reminders! Now you can choose the number of miles and the number of months separately for your oil change and tire rotation reminders.

Easily access them anytime inside your Glovebox.

We're giving you more flexibility on when you can receive service reminders! Now you can choose the number of miles and the number of months separately for your oil change and tire rotation reminders.

Easily access them anytime inside your Glovebox.
- Bug fixes and UI improvements to make your experience better.
- Bug fixes and UI improvements to make your experience better.

Introducing the CARFAX Well Maintained Badge! An exclusive honor for vehicles that follow the manufacturer’s recommended maintenance schedule and have all their oil changes performed at a myCARFAX Service Shop.

New and improved service reminders are here! Gain a better understanding of why service is due thanks to a detailed breakdown of your vehicle’s service history, current service intervals, and estimated vehicle mileage. And when it comes time to bring your vehicle to a myCARFAX Service Shop easily schedule an appointment with the tap of a button.

New and improved service reminders are here! Gain a better understanding of why service is due thanks to a detailed breakdown of your vehicle’s service history, current service intervals, and estimated vehicle mileage. And when it comes time to bring your vehicle to a myCARFAX Service Shop easily schedule an appointment with the tap of a button.
UI improvements and bug fixes.

myCARFAX is even more powerful with the addition of tire tracking! Monitor the health and well-being of your tires with tread life estimates, warranty reminders, and more. Tires will be automatically added for users who visit a myCARFAX service shop.

myCARFAX is even more powerful with the addition of tire tracking! Monitor the health and well-being of your tires with tread life estimates, warranty reminders, and more. Tires will be automatically added for users who visit a myCARFAX service shop.
Tires just got better! New features include updating tire arrangements, tracking tread life, and the ability to add tire information like brand, model, size, and TIN.

Tires just got better...again! Track the status of your tires with custom tread life reminders. Not sure if you need new tires? Our new "Check Tires" screen provides you with tips and pictures to help guide you through your tire inspection.
Bug fixes and UI improvements

We're here to listen! Your feedback is important so we've updated our Help & Feedback to better serve you. By answering a few simple questions you can:

- Remove a vehicle
- Update your oil change interval
- Add a recent service record
- And much more!
Misc. bug fixes and improvements.

- PDF uploads: Users can now upload PDF receipts to their service records
- Improving support for iOS 13
- Additional bug fixes and UI improvements

- Confirm Mileage: Users with abnormally low or high estimated annual mileage will be asked to confirm their mileage.
- Misc. bug fixes and UI improvements.

- Improved dashboard details page for Last Service and Next Service making it easier to understand when and why services are due.
- Misc. bug fixes and UI improvements.
- Fixed display issue when using certain Accessibility settings.

- myCARFAX is now CARFAX Car Care: It's the same great app that you know and love, just with a new name and new logo.
- Dark Mode: iOS 13 can now take advantage of Dark Mode within CARFAX Car Care.

- myCARFAX is now CARFAX Car Care: It's the same great app that you know and love, just with a new name and new logo.
- Dark Mode: iOS 13 can now take advantage of Dark Mode within CARFAX Car Care.
- Misc. bug fixes and improvements.

- myCARFAX is now CARFAX Car Care: It's the same great app that you know and love, just with a new name and new logo.
- Dark Mode: iOS 13 can now take advantage of Dark Mode within CARFAX Car Care.
- Fixed a bug causing related to users with expired login credentials.

- myCARFAX is now CARFAX Car Care: It's the same great app that you know and love, just with a new name and new logo.
- Dark Mode: iOS 13 can now take advantage of Dark Mode within CARFAX Car Care.
- Fixed a bug causing related to users with expired login credentials.
- Misc. bug fixes and UI improvements.

See what’s new in the latest version of CARFAX Car Care:

– Get with the program: There’s nothing more frustrating than getting your vehicle serviced but not seeing a record of it! Now it’s even easier to invite your shop to join the CARFAX Car Care program.
– Perhaps the archives are incomplete: Sometimes we’re not entirely sure what services were performed on your vehicle. Now, when this happens, we’ll ask you to update that record.
– Find what you’re looking for: A new and improved Find a Shop page will better help you find a nearby dealer or service shop.
– Bug smashing: Fixed a number of bugs, including unintentionally hiding tread life for users whose vehicles do not need tire rotations.

See what’s new in the latest version of CARFAX Car Care:

New for 2.57.1:

– COVID-19: Due to disruptions from COVID-19 shops have changed their procedures to meet state and local health policies. Additional messaging has been added to assist users in working with their favorite shops.
– Misc. bug fixes and improvements.

New for 2.57

– Get with the program: There’s nothing more frustrating than getting your vehicle serviced but not seeing a record of it! Now it’s even easier to invite your shop to join the CARFAX Car Care program.
– Perhaps the archives are incomplete: Sometimes we’re not entirely sure what services were performed on your vehicle. Now, when this happens, we’ll ask you to update that record.
– Find what you’re looking for: A new and improved Find a Shop page will better help you find a nearby dealer or service shop.
– Bug smashing: Fixed a number of bugs, including unintentionally hiding tread life for users whose vehicles do not need tire rotations.

Here's what's new in the latest version:

- Improved Service Shops search page gives you more options to filter down to the shop that meets your exact needs.
- CARFAX Car Care will automatically detect changes in vehicle ownership and prompt users to keep or remove the vehicle with a single button.
- Easily get trade-in offers on your vehicle thanks to CARFAX History Based Value. VIN specific offers are sent to local dealers to help get you into your next dream car.
- Misc. bug fixes and enhancements.

Here's what's new in the latest version:

- Misc. bug fixes and enhancements.
- Note: Facebook sign-up has been temporarily removed. This will return in our next full release.
- Misc. bug fixes and UI enhancements.

- Exciting news! Our app now supports Sign in with Apple, Facebook and Google so that you can log in or create an account more easily and quickly.
- Misc. bug fixes and improvements.

- We’ve tailored the Car Care experience for Canadian car owners – now you can choose between English and French as your preferred language, see open recalls in Canada, and view odometer readings in kilometers by default
- The improved service shop search page gives you more options to filter down to the shop that meets your exact needs
- CARFAX Canada Car Care now automatically detects changes in vehicle ownership and prompt users to keep or remove the vehicle with a single button
- Misc. bug fixes and enhancements
- Misc. bug fixes and enhancements
- Misc. bug fixes and enhancements
- Misc. bug fixes and enhancements
